about.help: Stochastic modeling was retrieved from Youtube from the channel J. Christopher Anderson, and was created on 10/22/2013.

contents.params: Stochastic modeling is an alternative to differential equations for describing biochemical systems.  it is particularly useful when dealing with small numbers of molecules.

The gillespie algorithm is the original 'stochastic modeling' method.  It employs random numbers to simulate individual reaction events and is thus a chemically exact method of simulating the dynamics of a biochemical system.
A paper about using stochastic models to explain some unusual phenomena in translation
